schemes.ObjectOfIssue:
The Company plans to utilize the Net Proceeds from the Fresh Issue for the following purposes:

- Acquisition of land and construction of a building

- Purchase of plant and machinery

- Funding additional working capital requirements

- General corporate purposes

schemes.companyDescription:
Founded in March 2021, Excellent Wires and Packaging Limited manufactures a diverse range of wires and wire ropes under the brand name "Excellent." Their product offerings include Spring Steel Wire, High Carbon Wire, Galvanized Wire (GI Wire), and more, serving multiple applications.

The company's product categories include:

- Brass Wires & Products

- Steel Wires & Products

- Packaging Products

These products cater to various industries such as packaging, engineering, stationery, imitation jewelry, wires & cables, among others. 

The company is ISO 9001:2015 certified, demonstrating a commitment to effective quality management. As of July 2024, Excellent Wires and Packaging Limited employed 18 people across various departments.
